entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 3 April 2023
